name: NOT-A-SUBMISSION
description:
Play my game even tho it isn't eligible for the jam :)

I worked on this a bit before the jam, so it does not count but I need the validation of people playing this game so I didn't waste my time :')

CREDITS

Programming: DevSledge

Level Design: DevSledge, Ben Meyer and Chloe Spanos

Art: DevSledge, Andrew Von Stieglitz, Jordan Hamlin for the particles and some random online assets for the enemies

SFX: Zapsplat.com

Music: Tropical 8-bit Chiptune by Filippo Game Audio

CONTROLS

WASD: Movement

Mouse Movement: Aim water gun

Left Mouse Button: Shoot

Space: Invulnerable Dash

Collect the fruit after clearing a level to get an upgrade
